mn123:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn123:2.1_0: Atha kho sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṁ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
mn123:2.2_0: “acchariyaṁ, āvuso, abbhutaṁ, āvuso. Tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā,
mn123:2.3_0: yatra hi nāma tathāgato atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte jānissati:
mn123:2.5_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando te bhikkhū etadavoca:
mn123:2.7_0: abbhutā ceva, āvuso, tathāgatā abbhutadhammasamannāgatā cā”ti.
mn123:2.8_0: Ayañca hidaṁ tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ antarākathā vippakatā hoti.
mn123:2.9_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenupaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami;
mn123:2.11_0: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā, kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti?
mn123:2.12_1: amhākaṁ pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṁ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
mn123:2.13_2: yatra hi nāma tathāgato atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte jānissati—
mn123:2.16_0: abbhutā ceva, āvuso, tathāgatā abbhutadhammasamannāgatā cā’ti.
mn123:2.17_0: Ayaṁ kho no, bhante, antarākathā vippakatā; atha bhagavā anuppatto”ti.
mn123:2.18_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
mn123:2.19_0: “tasmātiha taṁ, ānanda, bhiyyoso mattāya paṭibhantu tathāgatassa acchariyā abbhutadhammā”ti.
mn123:3.1_0: “Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:3.2_0: ‘sato sampajāno, ānanda, bodhisatto tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapajjī’ti.
mn123:3.3_1: sato sampajāno bodhisatto tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapajji idampāhaṁ, bhante,
mn123:4.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:4.2_0: ‘sato sampajāno, ānanda, bodhisatto tusite kāye aṭṭhāsī’ti.
mn123:4.3_1: sato sampajāno bodhisatto tusite kāye aṭṭhāsi idampāhaṁ, bhante,
mn123:5.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:5.3_1: yāvatāyukaṁ bodhisatto tusite kāye aṭṭhāsi idampāhaṁ, bhante,
mn123:6.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:6.2_0: ‘sato sampajāno, ānanda, bodhisatto tusitā, kāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṁ okkamī’ti.
mn123:6.3_1: sato sampajāno bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṁ okkami idampāhaṁ, bhante,
mn123:7.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:7.2_0: ‘yadā, ānanda, bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṁ okkamati,
mn123:7.3_0: atha sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso
mn123:7.4_0: Yāpi tā lokantarikā aghā asaṁvutā andhakārā andhakāratimisā,
mn123:7.4_1: yatthapime candimasūriyā evaṁmahiddhikā evaṁmahānubhāvā ābhāya nānubhonti tatthapi appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso
mn123:7.5_0: Yepi tattha sattā upapannā tepi tenobhāsena aññamaññaṁ sañjānanti—aññepi kira, bho,
mn123:7.6_0: Ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pātubhavati atikkammeva devānaṁ devānubhāvan’ti.
mn123:7.7_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:8.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:8.2_2: cattāro devaputtā catuddisaṁ ārakkhāya upagacchanti—mā naṁ bodhisattaṁ vā bodhisattamātaraṁ vā manusso vā amanusso vā koci vā viheṭhesī’ti.
mn123:8.3_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:9.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:9.2_2: pakatiyā sīlavatī bodhisattamātā hoti viratā pāṇātipātā viratā adinnādānā viratā kāmesumicchācārā viratā
mn123:9.3_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:10.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:10.2_2: na bodhisattamātu purisesu mānasaṁ uppajjati kāmaguṇūpasaṁhitaṁ,
mn123:10.2_3: anatikkamanīyā ca bodhisattamātā hoti kenaci purisena rattacittenā’ti.
mn123:10.3_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:11.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:11.2_3: Sā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricāretī’ti.
mn123:11.3_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:12.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:12.2_4: bodhisattañca bodhisattamātā tirokucchigataṁ passati sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṁ ahīnindriyaṁ.
mn123:12.3_1: maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṁso suparikammakato.
mn123:12.3_2: Tatrāssa suttaṁ āvutaṁ nīlaṁ vā pītaṁ vā lohitaṁ vā odātaṁ vā paṇḍusuttaṁ vā.
mn123:12.4_0: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso hatthe karitvā paccavekkheyya—ayaṁ kho maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṁso suparikammakato,
mn123:12.4_1: tatridaṁ suttaṁ āvutaṁ nīlaṁ vā pītaṁ vā lohitaṁ vā odātaṁ vā paṇḍusuttaṁ vāti.
mn123:12.5_4: bodhisattañca bodhisattamātā tirokucchigataṁ passati sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṁ ahīnindriyan’ti.
mn123:12.6_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:13.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:13.2_0: ‘sattāhajāte, ānanda, bodhisatte bodhisattamātā kālaṁ karoti, tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapajjatī’ti.
mn123:13.3_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:14.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:14.2_1: aññā itthikā nava vā dasa vā māse gabbhaṁ kucchinā pariharitvā vijāyanti,
mn123:14.2_3: Daseva māsāni bodhisattaṁ bodhisattamātā kucchinā pariharitvā vijāyatī’ti.
mn123:14.3_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:15.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:15.2_1: aññā itthikā nisinnā vā nipannā vā vijāyanti,
mn123:15.3_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:16.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:16.2_2: devā naṁ paṭhamaṁ paṭiggaṇhanti pacchā manussā’ti.
mn123:16.3_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:17.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:17.2_3: cattāro naṁ devaputtā paṭiggahetvā mātu purato ṭhapenti—attamanā, devi, hohi;
mn123:17.3_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:18.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:18.2_2: visadova nikkhamati amakkhito udena amakkhito semhena amakkhito ruhirena amakkhito kenaci asucinā suddho visado.
mn123:18.3_1: maṇiratanaṁ kāsike vatthe nikkhittaṁ neva maṇiratanaṁ kāsikaṁ vatthaṁ makkheti nāpi kāsikaṁ vatthaṁ maṇiratanaṁ makkheti.
mn123:18.6_2: visadova nikkhamati amakkhito udena amakkhito semhena amakkhito ruhirena amakkhito kenaci asucinā suddho visado’ti.
mn123:18.7_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:19.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:19.2_2: dve udakassa dhārā antalikkhā pātubhavanti—ekā sītassa,
mn123:19.2_4: yena bodhisattassa udakakiccaṁ karonti mātu cā’ti.
mn123:19.3_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:20.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:20.2_1: bodhisatto samehi pādehi pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati,
mn123:20.3_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremi.
mn123:21.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
mn123:21.2_2: atha sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso
mn123:21.3_0: Yāpi tā lokantarikā aghā asaṁvutā andhakārā andhakāratimisā yatthapime candimasūriyā evaṁmahiddhikā evaṁmahānubhāvā
mn123:21.3_1: ābhāya nānubhonti tatthapi appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso loke pātubhavati atikkammeva devānaṁ devānubhāvaṁ.
mn123:21.4_0: Yepi tattha sattā upapannā tepi tenobhāsena aññamaññaṁ sañjānanti—aññepi kira, bho,
mn123:21.5_0: Ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati,
mn123:21.5_1: appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pātubhavati atikkammeva devānaṁ devānubhāvan’ti.
mn123:21.6_0: Yampi, bhante …pe… idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremī”ti.
mn123:22.1_0: “Tasmātiha tvaṁ, ānanda, idampi tathāgatassa acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhārehi.
mn123:22.2_0: Idhānanda, tathāgatassa viditā vedanā uppajjanti, viditā upaṭṭhahanti, viditā abbhatthaṁ gacchanti;
mn123:22.4_0: viditā vitakkā uppajjanti, viditā upaṭṭhahanti, viditā abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
mn123:22.5_0: Idampi kho tvaṁ, ānanda, tathāgatassa acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhārehī”ti.
mn123:23.3_0: viditā vitakkā uppajjanti, viditā upaṭṭhahanti, viditā abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
mn123:23.4_0: Idampāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ dhāremī”ti.
mn123:23.7_0: attamanā ca te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
